metadata.description: Registry of all available RAG vector stores for the LLM Framework
metadata.note: This file tracks which vector stores are available and their enabled/disabled status. The LLM will search through all attached stores.

configuration_notes.enabled: Set to true to enable searching this vector store, false to disable
configuration_notes.vector_store_path: Path to directory containing index.faiss, metadata.jsonl, and config.json
configuration_notes.embedding_model: MUST match the model used to create the vector store (enforced by config.json)
configuration_notes.embedding_dimension: Vector dimension (384 for MiniLM, 768 for MPNet/Jina models)
configuration_notes.index_type: FAISS index type (IndexFlatIP for exact cosine similarity)
configuration_notes.model_cache_dir: Path to cached embedding models for faster loading
configuration_notes.top_k_results: Number of most similar documents to retrieve per query
configuration_notes.similarity_threshold: Minimum similarity score (0.0-1.0) to include results
configuration_notes.max_context_length: Maximum characters to send to LLM from this store
configuration_notes.created_date: ISO date when vector store was created (null if not yet created)
configuration_notes.num_vectors: Total number of vectors in the store (0 if not yet created)
configuration_notes.metadata.source_type: Type of content (documentation, code, qa_pairs, general, etc.)

usage_instructions.enabling_stores: Set 'enabled: true' for any stores you want the LLM to search
usage_instructions.creating_stores: Use data_stores/tools/Create_VectorStore.py to build vector stores
usage_instructions.model_consistency: The embedding_model MUST match between creation and querying
usage_instructions.multiple_stores: LLM will aggregate results from all enabled stores
usage_instructions.path_resolution: Paths can be absolute or relative to the project root

changes: v1.0: Initial schema with required and optional RAG parameters
